document_data.name: Coffee House of Buri
document_data.mainbody: The '''Coffee House of Buri''' was a small shop in [[Bandar al-Sa'adat]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: The establishment  was located near [[Usamah the Carpet Dealer]] in the Bandar al-Sa'adat marketplace.
document_data.Structure: Near the carpet dealer's stand, the structure was buried behind a large line of stacked fruit.
document_data.Interior: The interior of the Coffee House of Buri was furnished with carpets and ragged cushions. Customers enjoyed a pleasant variety of sweet and overly spiced coffee.
document_data.Inhabitants: Both [[Alix]] and [[Karbuqa]] were known to frequent the coffee house.
